tool_description: Evaluates ticket priority based on configurable business rules, issue severity, customer impact, and organizational policies.

ticket_data.description: JSON string containing ticket information from Ticket Data Extractor

rule_set.description: Priority rule configuration name (standard, enterprise, custom)

business_hours_only.description: Whether to apply business hours restrictions

error_messages: Invalid ticket data: Ticket data must be valid JSON with required fields (ticket_id, category, customer_id, created_at).
Unknown rule set: Rule set must be one of [standard, enterprise, custom]. Check available configurations.
Rule evaluation failed: Unable to process rules due to missing required ticket attributes. Ensure ticket data is complete.
usage: Pass ticket data from Ticket Data Extractor and specify the rule_set to use. The tool returns priority classification and escalation recommendations.

priority_level.description: Calculated priority level (low, medium, high, critical)

applied_rules.description: List of rules that influenced the priority calculation
